GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_dup_netdev: do not push mac header a second time

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit e70598d1576928fd9d56dd544d41ae694ab0818a, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit f87b9464d152f7705f1e37288dc48f5af6a2fc0c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: nf_dup_netdev: do not push mac header a second time
